title: Light-blocking two-inch blinds, Kitchen island with pendant lighting*
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 736 Sq.
Welcome to Aura Watson Branch, a brand-new luxury apartment community in Mansfield, Texas.

Discover how upscale features and modern amenities blend with a quiet hometown atmosphere to create an unparalleled living experience just minutes from the ample opportunities that await you in Dallas-Fort Worth.

Walk-in shower(s)*, Decorative plumbing fixtures, Kitchen pantry, Double vanities* and vanity mirrors with decorative lighting, Custom carpeting, Sophisticated shaker-style two-tone kitchen cabinets with under cabinet lighting, Spacious walk-in closet(s) with custom wood shelving, Private patio/balcony, Garden soaking tub(s), Ceiling fans, Kitchen island with pendant lighting*, Stainless steel kitchen appliances: side-by-side refrigerator with water and ice dispenser, built-in microwave, and dishwasher*, Granite countertops and under-mount sinks with Stylish backsplash, Ceramic glass cooktop stove, Linen closet(s)*, Light-blocking two-inch blinds, Private yards*, Hardwood-style flooring, Contemporary light fixtures, Modern interiors, Expansive nine-foot ceilings, In-home washer/dryer*
*Amenities may vary and are subject to change at any time

Pet-friendly community, Pet park, Resort-style pool with cabanas, a spacious deck, and propane grills, Tuck-under garages, A multi-level fitness center with cardio theatre, strength equipment, and free weights, Valet trash service, Business lounge with private conference rooms, Spin room with interactive classes, 24/7 package service, Clubhouse with kitchen and shuffleboard table, Gated community, On-site recycling, Outdoor courtyard(s) with a fire pit and
bocce ball court, Controlled access with video intercom system, Elevators, Covered parking, Wi-Fi in common areas,
Comments: Breed restrictions apply, pet records and photo required.
Please contact leasing office for details.
